instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A2159 - 820-01598-A no power on
threads.message:
Hi,

I have an A2159 - 820-01598-A that doesn't power on, pulls 20V from ampmeter, and 0.40A (W/O battery), and arround 3A with battery. It has fan spin, but no USB activity nither internal or external image.

Big CPU coils have 0V, but CPU gets hot.

Can you help?

threads.title: A2159 - 820-01598-A no power on
threads.message: Start with DFU revive; choose restore, if no important data on its SSD.

threads.title: A2159 - 820-01598-A no power on
threads.message:
Hi, 
I've done both revive and restore, but no success. I'm not even sure if it was done sucessufly, because at the end, nothing happens (no error message, nothing...)

threads.title: A2159 - 820-01598-A no power on
threads.message: Hi’ hgoncalves. Did you resolve your problem? If; how and what was wrong? Cheers Morten

threads.title: A2159 - 820-01598-A no power on
threads.message:
Hi  Mortentoft.
Unfortunently, my client was traveling and didn't have the time to wait for a solution. This one wasn't solved...
